comment.body: what about add some functionality such as v2ray or shadowsocks for bootstrappers? sorry I can't input Chinese ,due to not having configured fcitx correctly.

@猫叉酱（小号）: no , just add some encryption mechanism, to avoid GFW. In other words , peers of bootstrap  will offer and only offer "ladders" for other zeronet peers (of course not for normal internet traffic ) using techniques like v2ray or shadowsocks
@猫叉酱（小号）: sounds interesting ,if someone can implement it
